name: ssinss1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wss(cin(c0, c2), c0)
-| wi(wss(cin(c0, c2), c0), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wss(cin(c0, c2), c0)
-| wi(wss(cin(c0, c2), c0), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1)))

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wss(cin(c0, c2), c0), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(cin(c0, c2), c0), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1)))

comment: Intersection preserves subclass relationship. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-1999.)
